commit.message:
Merge #834

834: use better label for &mut ref completion r=matklad a=matklad



Co-authored-by: Aleksey Kladov <aleksey.kladov@gmail.com>

files.patch:
@@ -1,5 +1,5 @@
 ---

 creator: insta@0.6.2
 source: crates/ra_ide_api/src/completion/completion_item.rs
 expression: kind_completions
@@ -82,15 +82,15 @@ expression: kind_completions
     },
     CompletionItem {
         completion_kind: Postfix,
-        label: "mref",
+        label: "not",
         kind: None,
         detail: Some(
-            "&mut expr"
+            "!expr"
         ),
         documentation: None,
         lookup: None,
         insert_text: Some(
-            "&mut bar"
+            "!bar"
         ),
         insert_text_format: Snippet,
         source_range: [76; 76),
@@ -107,15 +107,15 @@ expression: kind_completions
     },

         completion_kind: Postfix,
-        label: "not",
+        label: "ref",
         kind: None,
         detail: Some(
-            "!expr"
+            "&expr"
         ),
         documentation: None,
         lookup: None,
         insert_text: Some(
-            "!bar"

         ),
         insert_text_format: Snippet,
         source_range: [76; 76),
@@ -132,15 +132,15 @@ expression: kind_completions
     },

         completion_kind: Postfix,
-        label: "ref",

         kind: None,
         detail: Some(
-            "&expr"

         documentation: None,
         lookup: None,
         insert_text: Some(
-            "&bar"

         insert_text_format: Snippet,
         source_range: [76; 76),
